price: as a provision for people, and We revive thereby a dead land; likewise will be the resurrection.
arabic: رِّزۡقٗا لِّلۡعِبَادِۖ وَأَحۡيَيۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡخُرُوجُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: riz'qan lil'ʿibādi wa-aḥyaynā bihi baldatan maytan kadhālika al-khurūju
